title: First Come, First Seat, Third Served
description: We are in chambers this week while Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn clear the docket! They settle disputes regarding second screening while watching TV with your partner, the past tense of "text," seating in casual restaurants and more! Plus listener letters about the U.S. Postal Service!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)

Plus listener letters about the U.S. Postal Service!
